body:
Hi

Any way to make Spack ignore a particular library located within /lib64, during compile, such as **libgpfs.so**?

If so this would make installing software easier in our environment which does not have GPFS mounted everywhere.

I ran into this issue with Relion which we mainly use in our cluster.  Though some users like to run on workstations.
